trans-unit.source: Specifies all settings required to make a WMI connection.
trans-unit.target: 指定要建立 WMI 連線所需的所有設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.ConnectionOptions"></xref> class for the connection operation, using default values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Management.ConnectionOptions"></xref>連接作業，使用預設值的類別。

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設建構函式。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new ConnectionOption.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的 ConnectionOption。

trans-unit.source: The locale to be used for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 要連接所使用的地區設定。

trans-unit.source: The user name to be used for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 要用於連接的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: If null, the credentials of the currently logged-on user are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 null，則會使用目前登入之使用者的認證。

trans-unit.source: The password for the given user name.
trans-unit.target: 指定的使用者名稱的密碼。

trans-unit.source: If the user name is also null, the credentials used will be those of the currently logged-on user.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者名稱也是 null，使用的認證會與目前登入的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The authority to be used to authenticate the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 要用來驗證指定的使用者授權。

trans-unit.source: The COM impersonation level to be used for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 要連接所使用的 COM 模擬等級。

trans-unit.source: The COM authentication level to be used for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 要連接所使用的 COM 驗證等級。

trans-unit.source: true to enable special user privileges; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: true 表示啟用特殊的使用者權限;否則為 false。

trans-unit.source: This parameter should only be used when performing an operation that requires special Windows NT user privileges.
trans-unit.target: 執行需要特殊的 Windows NT 使用者權限的作業時，應該只使用這個參數。

trans-unit.source: A provider-specific, named value pairs object to be passed through to the provider.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞到提供者的提供者特定的具名值組物件。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 保留供將來使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.ConnectionOptions"></xref> class to be used for a WMI connection, using the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Management.ConnectionOptions"></xref>類別，以用於 WMI 連線，使用指定的值。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The locale to be used for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 要連接所使用的地區設定。

trans-unit.source: The user name to be used for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 要用於連接的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: If null, the credentials of the currently logged-on user are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 null，則會使用目前登入之使用者的認證。

trans-unit.source: The password for the given user name.
trans-unit.target: 指定的使用者名稱的密碼。

trans-unit.source: If the user name is also null, the credentials used will be those of the currently logged-on user.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者名稱也是 null，使用的認證會與目前登入的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The authority to be used to authenticate the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 要用來驗證指定的使用者授權。

trans-unit.source: The COM impersonation level to be used for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 要連接所使用的 COM 模擬等級。

trans-unit.source: The COM authentication level to be used for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 要連接所使用的 COM 驗證等級。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable special user privileges; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要啟用特殊的使用者權限;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This parameter should only be used when performing an operation that requires special Windows NT user privileges.
trans-unit.target: 執行需要特殊的 Windows NT 使用者權限的作業時，應該只使用這個參數。

trans-unit.source: A provider-specific, named value pairs object to be passed through to the provider.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞到提供者的提供者特定的具名值組物件。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 保留供將來使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the COM authentication level to be used for operations in this connection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用於這個連接作業中的 COM 驗證層級。

trans-unit.source: On Windows 2000 and below, the WMI service will request Connect level authentication, while on Windows XP and higher it will request Packet level authentication.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 2000 及以下的 WMI 服務會要求連接層級驗證，在 Windows XP 上的和更高版本，它會要求封包層級驗證。

trans-unit.source: If the client requires a specific authentication setting, this property can be used to control the authentication level on this particular connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端需要特定的驗證設定，這個屬性可用來控制這個特定的連接上的驗證層級。

trans-unit.source: For example, the property can be set to <xref:System.Management.AuthenticationLevel?displayProperty=fullName> if the client requires all communication to be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 例如，屬性可以設<xref:System.Management.AuthenticationLevel?displayProperty=fullName>如果用戶端需要的所有通訊進行加密。</xref:System.Management.AuthenticationLevel?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Property Value The COM authentication level to be used for operations in this connection.
trans-unit.target: 要用於這個連接作業中的屬性值的 COM 驗證等級。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Management.AuthenticationLevel?displayProperty=fullName>, which indicates that the client will use the authentication level requested by the server, according to the standard DCOM negotiation process.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Management.AuthenticationLevel?displayProperty=fullName>，表示用戶端會使用伺服器要求的驗證層級根據標準的 DCOM 交涉程序。</xref:System.Management.AuthenticationLevel?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Management.AuthenticationLevel"></xref> enumeration value indicating the COM authentication level used for a connection to the local or a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Management.AuthenticationLevel"></xref>列舉值，指出用於連接到本機或遠端電腦的 COM 驗證層級。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the authority to be used to authenticate the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來驗證指定的使用者的權限。

trans-unit.source: The property must be passed as follows: If it begins with the string "Kerberos:", Kerberos authentication will be used and this property should contain a Kerberos principal name.
trans-unit.target: 必須傳遞的屬性，如下所示︰ 如果它是以字串的開頭"Kerberos:"將會使用 Kerberos 驗證，這個屬性應該包含 Kerberos 主體名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, ``` Kerberos:<principal name> ``` If the property value begins with the string "NTLMDOMAIN:", NTLM authentication will be used and the property should contain a NTLM domain name.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，``` Kerberos:<principal name> ```屬性值字串開頭為"NTLMDOMAIN:"，則會使用 NTLM 驗證和屬性應該包含 NTLM 網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, ``` NTLMDOMAIN:<domain name> ``` If the property is null, NTLM authentication will be used and the NTLM domain of the current user will be used.
trans-unit.target: 例如，``` NTLMDOMAIN:<domain name> ```如果屬性為 null，則會使用 NTLM 驗證並會使用目前使用者的 NTLM 網域。

trans-unit.source: Property Value If not `null`, this property can contain the name of the Windows NT/Windows 2000 domain in which to obtain the user to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值如果不是`null`，這個屬性可以包含 NT/Windows 2000年定義域，以便取得要驗證的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> that defines the authority used to authenticate the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.String>，定義用來驗證指定的使用者的授權單位。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件的複本。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether user privileges need to be enabled for the connection operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否需要啟用，連線作業的使用者權限。

trans-unit.source: This property should only be used when the operation performed requires a certain user privilege to be enabled (for example, a machine restart).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性應該只用於執行的作業需要特定使用者權限 （例如，重新啟動機器） 啟用時。

trans-unit.source: ## Property Value `true` if user privileges need to be enabled for the connection operation; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: ##屬性值`true`使用者權限必須針對連接作業啟用，否則如果`false`。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value indicating whether user privileges need to be enabled for the connection operation.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Boolean>值，指出是否需要啟用，連線作業的使用者權限。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the COM impersonation level to be used for operations in this connection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用於這個連接作業中的 COM 模擬等級。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Management.ImpersonationLevel?displayProperty=fullName> setting is advantageous when the provider is a trusted application or service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Management.ImpersonationLevel?displayProperty=fullName>設定的好處是，當您信任的應用程式或服務提供者。</xref:System.Management.ImpersonationLevel?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It eliminates the need for the provider to perform client identity and access checks for the requested operations.
trans-unit.target: 不需要執行用戶端身分識別提供者，並存取檢查要求的作業。

trans-unit.source: However, if for some reason the provider cannot be trusted, allowing it to impersonate the client may constitute a security threat.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果基於某些原因無法信任提供者，讓它可以模擬用戶端可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: In such cases, we recommend that this property be set by the client to a lower value, such as <xref:System.Management.ImpersonationLevel?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 在這種情況下，我們建議此屬性設定為較低的值，例如<xref:System.Management.ImpersonationLevel?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Management.ImpersonationLevel?displayProperty=fullName>用戶端

trans-unit.source: Note that this may cause failure of the provider to perform the requested operations, for lack of sufficient permissions or inability to perform access checks.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這可能會造成失敗的提供者來執行要求的作業缺乏足夠的權限或無法執行存取檢查。

trans-unit.source: Property Value The COM impersonation level to be used for operations in this connection.
trans-unit.target: 要用於這個連接作業中的屬性值的 COM 模擬等級。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Management.ImpersonationLevel?displayProperty=fullName>, which indicates that the WMI provider can impersonate the client when performing the requested operations in this connection.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Management.ImpersonationLevel?displayProperty=fullName>，表示此連接在執行要求的作業時的 WMI 提供者可以模擬用戶端。</xref:System.Management.ImpersonationLevel?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Management.ImpersonationLevel"></xref> enumeration value indicating the impersonation level used to connect to WMI.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Management.ImpersonationLevel"></xref>列舉值，指出用來連接到 WMI 的模擬等級。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the locale to be used for the connection operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用於連線作業的地區設定。

trans-unit.source: For Microsoft locale identifiers, the format of the string is "MS_*xxx*", where *xxx* is a string in hexadecimal form that indicates the Locale Identification (LCID); for example, American English would appear as "MS_409".
trans-unit.target: Microsoft 地區設定識別碼，該字串的格式是 「 MS_*xxx*"，其中*xxx*以十六進位格式表示的地區設定識別碼 (LCID); 例如，美式英文會顯示成 「 MS_409 」 是一個字串。

trans-unit.source: Property Value The default value is DEFAULTLOCALE.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值的預設值為 DEFAULTLOCALE。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> value used for the locale in a connection to WMI.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.String>用於連線至 WMI 中的地區設定的值。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Sets the password for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定之使用者的密碼。

trans-unit.source: A blank string ("") specifies a valid zero-length password.
trans-unit.target: 空白的字串 ("") 指定的有效長度為零的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Hard-coding a password is a security threat.
trans-unit.target: 硬式編碼的密碼是一項安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: Use security precautions such as encrypting a password, or prompting the user for a password when you set the Password property.
trans-unit.target: 使用的安全預防措施，例如加密密碼，或提示使用者輸入密碼，當您設定密碼屬性。

trans-unit.source: Property Value The default value is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值，預設值是`null`。

trans-unit.source: If the user name is also `null`, the credentials used will be those of the currently logged-on user.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者名稱也是`null`，所使用的認證將是目前登入的使用者。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> value used for the password in a connection to WMI.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.String>值用來連線至 WMI 中的密碼。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Sets the password for the specified user.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定之使用者的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns a SecureString value used for the password in a connection to WMI.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 SecureString 值用於連線至 WMI 中的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user name to be used for the connection operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用於連線作業的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> value used as the user name in a connection to WMI.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.String>做為連線至 WMI 中的使用者名稱的值。</xref:System.String>
